name: innuendo
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(the making of) a remark or remarks that suggest something sexual or something unpleasant but do not refer to it directly: sexual innuendo There's always an element of sexual innuendo in our conversations. Synonyms
hint (INDIRECT STATEMENT)
implication
imputation formal
insinuation
intimation formal
suggestion

Add to word list
Add to word list
a remark that suggests something but does not refer to it directly, or this type of remark in general: [ U ] The election campaign was marred by rumor and innuendo.
